name: com.antigravity.editor
description: Antigravity editor integration for supporting Antigravity as code editor for Unity. Adds support for generating csproj files for intellisense purposes, auto discovery of installations, etc.

_upm.changelog: 1.1.7:\\n- Fix: GUID 충돌 해결 (Cursor IDE와의 중복 GUID)\\n- Fix: Assembly definition이 올바르게 로드되도록 수정\\n\\n1.1.6:\\n- Fix: Ensure Antigravity always appears in External Script Editor dropdown even if not installed\\n- Improvement: Users can now manually browse for Antigravity installation path\\n\\n1.1.5:\\n- Fix: Assembly definition name corrected for Unity Package Manager compatibility\\n\\n1.1.4:\\n- Fix: Corrected InternalsVisibleTo assembly references\\n- Fix: Changed AntigravityExternalEditor class from public to internal for proper initialization\\n- Fix: Fixed metadata references to match Antigravity namespace\\n\\n1.1.0:\\n- Major Refactor: Ported from com.unity.ide.cursor structure\\n- Added .csproj generation support\\n- Improved process management\\n- Added reuse window option
